links.title: AngloGold Ashanti Doubles Dividend Payout Ratio as Q3 Free Cash Flow Increases 290%
links.description: TICKERS: AU; ANG; AGG; AGD Shares of AngloGold Ashanti Ltd. traded 9% higher after the company reported that Q3/20 free cash flow increased 290% YoY to $339 million allowing it to double its dividend payout ratio to 20%. Global gold mining company AngloGold Ashanti Ltd.
